channel.title: Infinity item sale amount in shops
channel.description: Ok, i've been on some servers where when you buy an item it never goes down. It doesn't have a number next to the item in the shop and it just looks like there is one of that item. Then when you buy from it it never goes down.

item.title: Infinity item sale amount in shops
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Ok, so you saw servers where shops have unlimited items? Whats the problem?

Read full topic
item.source: Infinity item sale amount in shops
